title: Adv VLSI Systems
description: An advanced treatment of VLSI systems analysis, design, and testing with emphasis on complex systems and how they are incorporated into a silicon environment.  Credit is not allowed for both ECE 4130 and ECE 6130.

prerequisites: ECE 3150 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
